name: Anabelle
description:
Note: This game is for my LevelDesign porfolio. Game is presented in in pro type form.

________

Summary:

An adaption on the classic fairy tale Beauty and The Beast. You play John Sullivan, a villager who discovers his father has been captured by The Beast. 

A noble family used to live in the old castle. However, when Annabelle, the oldest daughter, refused to marry, her mother cursed her, transforming her into a beast and refusing to let her become human again unless she agrees to marry a suitor of the mother’s choosing. Having fallen in love with her servant, Annabelle refused, and has killed her entire family in her rage. 

It’s up to the player to decide Annabelle’s--and your father’s--fate.
